query.stmt: select b.id,b.company,spd.name dept_name,s.name,b.state,b.remarks,b.author_one,b.author_two,b.author_three, s.name create_user,b.create_time from bi_manu b left join sys_p_user s on b.create_user=s.id left join sys_p_department spd on b.dept_id=spd.id where b.job_num = s.id and b.state in (1,3) order by b.approve_time desc
